description: Corner townhouse, with MANY IMPROVEMENTS with respect to how they were delivered originally. Zoned home automation for the automatic opening of blinds in addition to the alarm. COMMON AREAS: In addition to the private pool, this property has a communal area where there is another pool, multipurpose court and 2 paddle courts. The villa is distributed as follows: Access floor: Kitchen with dining room and laundry room Courtesy toilet Living - Dining room with fireplace and access to the garden. Glazed porch type lumon, and nice views of the plot, pool, etc. 1st floor: 3 bedrooms sharing a full bathroom + master bedroom with large closet area and full bathroom suite type. 2nd floor: Fully conditioned, a large multipurpose room. Floor -1: Garage for two cars. SPA. In Jaime Valcarce Consulting Inmobiliario S. L. we commercialize this property EXCLUSIVELY. THE HOME YOU ARE LOOKING FOR IS IN COBEÑA! Fantastic corner townhouse, built on four floors with high quality, central vacuum throughout the house, swimming pool and private garage, located in one of the best areas of Cobeña. As we enter the house through the porch, we find the hall that leads to the rooms on the main floor, a fully equipped kitchen, a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, a bathroom with a shower, and a spacious and bright living room with fireplace and access to the garden. On the first floor we have the master bedroom, bathroom en suite with bathtub, built-in wardrobe and terrace with awning, it also has two other bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, one of them also with access to the terrace and a complete bathroom with a bathtub that provides service to the same. On the second floor is the 55m² open-plan loft, with four velux windows to make the most of it. Finally, we cannot forget the beautiful garden of 282m², part flooring and part with natural grass, wooden pergola, barbecue, swimming pool and with access to the basement where the garage for two vehicles is located, and a fantastic cellar with fireplace and Wine rack on the wall, where you can spend some magnificent moments in the company of our own. The town of Cobeña stands out for being a very quiet area to live, with all services within reach (Health Center, Supermarkets, Gyms, small shops.. . ) and is also well known for its great gastronomic offer. It has a very good location since it is communicated with accesses to the A-1 (Burgos), A-2 (Barcelona), M-50 and R-2. You also have access to the Madrid-Barajas Airport via the Belvis de Jarama road. It is located 9 km from San Sebastián de los Reyes, 11 km from Alcobendas, 3 km from Algete and Ajalvir, 15 km from Alcalá de Henares and 13 km from Torrejón de Ardoz. Do not miss the opportunity to come and see this fantastic house with an unbeatable location! CALL US, WE WILL BE DELIGHTED TO SHOW YOU.

FIRST LEVEL REAL ESTATE SELLS this corner semi-detached house, with its own pool. It is an excellent opportunity to live in a magnificent environment surrounded by nature a few minutes from Madrid, in a Municipality that has all the services and a great quality of life. Welcome to your future home in Cobeña, where charm combines with functionality in this dream independent villa. This 441 square meter architectural gem stands majestically on a plot of more than 600 square meters. Imagine your days starting on the ground floor, where a spacious garage with capacity for 3 cars, a workshop and a living room with kitchen welcome you, harmoniously connecting with the lush garden. This space becomes the perfect setting for family gatherings and unforgettable moments. But the story doesn't end here, as floors one and two reveal an ingenious secret. Divided by three partitions, these two floors make up two independent homes. The magic touch? The opportunity to rent one of the homes to help with the mortgage, accommodate your parents or provide independence for your children. Both symmetrical and elegantly designed homes offer a cozy living room, a modern kitchen and a toilet on the ground floor, while on the upper floor, three bedrooms and two bathrooms guarantee comfort and privacy. The garden, your private oasis, is presented as a place of escape. Enjoy the serenity in the Chill out area, take a dip in the saltwater pool, explore the exquisite garden area or host outdoor gatherings in the barbecue area. This chalet is not just a house; It is the culmination of your dreams, a space where everyday life is transformed into an unforgettable narrative.

Three-story residential complex, in a gated community with 136 homes with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, all of them with large outdoor terraces. Ground floor apartments with garden and duplex penthouses with terraces and views of the Madrid mountains. In this promotion, the magnificent common areas stand out, with community swimming pools, a community premises with a gastrotheque, an equipped gym and an outdoor children's area, large garden spaces among which a protected pine forest stands out, as well as an urban garden to enjoy with the little ones. In addition, the homes will have a garage and storage room. The northern area of Madrid Cobeña is a municipality that combines all the comforts, surrounded by nature and tranquility, which also has excellent communications. In a quiet and distinguished place in the northern area of Madrid, surrounded by green spaces and with all services. AEDAS Homes offers you new construction homes in Cobeña that adapt to your needs and tastes. You can choose options with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms with terrace, garage and storage room, all with exceptional qualities. In addition, you will have the possibility of enjoying common areas with swimming pools, a playground, an urban garden, Citybox lockers, a gym and a gastrotheque/coworking, ideal for relaxing and sharing good times with your family and friends.   These new construction homes in Cobeña are very efficient thanks to their double A label and their insulation, air conditioning, energy and drainage systems. Several bus lines – 1 63 and the N103 – connect with the Plaza de Castilla y Barajas Intercambiador, as well as with the nearby municipalities of Paracuellos, Daganzo or Algete. By road, the M-100 will quickly connect you with the A1 and the M-108 with the A2. The M-103 and M-111 have immediate connection with the M-50 and the R-2, allowing you to join both in less than 5 minutes. The Plaza Norte shopping center and the Infanta Sofía Hospital will be an instant away from your home.

The Cobeña Sky development has 25 VPPL high-rise homes in a large gated community with a communal pool and garden areas where you can enjoy your leisure time. Cobeña Sky is located north of Madrid, just 20 km from the center in the municipality of Cobeña where you will find the perfect balance between tranquility and modernity. In its surroundings there is everything you need for day-to-day life such as a health center, educational centers, both public and private, supermarkets, local shops and catering establishments. Cobeña Sky has terraces of around 10 m2, this area being larger in penthouses and ground floors with gardens. The 2, 3 and 4-bedroom homes have been designed with attention to detail with high-quality finishes such as continuous wood imitation porcelain flooring in all rooms, smooth white interior carpentry, designer bathroom furniture and underfloor heating and cooling. * The prices expressed are approximate cost prices that include a contribution from each partner as share capital. The houses include 1 or 2 parking spaces and a storage room. Provision of housing for people with reduced mobility, complying with the Regulations of the Housing Council of the Community of Madrid.
